attributes.title: 2022 Kia Sorento 2.2D SXL AWD Auto

attributes.description:
The KIA Sportage has been a hit on South African roads ever since its first release. The interior is well appointed, with controls nearby, and very comfy seating for five. Performance comes courtesy of a 2.0 turbocharged diesel engine, providing 131Kw and 400Nm of torque, mated to a ultra smooth 6 speed auto gearbox, which is enough to blast past slower drivers when overtaking, and at the same time, returning a more than respectable fuel consumption.

Balance of KIA's 5 year / unlimited mileage warranty, which is also extendable.

Don't Miss Out, Call Us Today, or Leave Your Details and We Will Call You.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome, Full Service History At Agents.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs E&OE

As one of the many MOTUS Select Pre-owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority! 

MOTUS: Live. Love. Drive.
